## DurableOperation.sendCallbackHeartbeat() method

Sends a callback heartbeat to the durable execution service to keep the callback active.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendCallbackHeartbeat(): Promise<SendDurableExecutionCallbackHeartbeatResponse>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;SendDurableExecutionCallbackHeartbeatResponse&gt;

A promise that resolves to the callback heartbeat response

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if callback details are not available
